title: (30149) El Siscar - 7 Calle Vicente Medina
description: Free parking, quiet place next to the church. No services

title: (30139) Murcia - 17 Pa Carrizos 1
description: Gas station with coin launderette

title: (30140) Santomera - 25 Calle Camino Montesinos
description: Perfect parking to spend a night. Silent, next to the hockey field and sports courts. Restaurant next door.

title: (30588) zeneta (murcia) - 648 F-16
description: "Casablanca" motorhome area. Located in the mountainous landscape of Tabala, 2 km from the Rio Segura and 15 km from the Torremendo dam. Facilities available: small gym, covered barbecue, leisure area with billiards and TV. Hot showers, washing machine and dryer. Free Wi-Fi (weak mobile network). Electricity at each location. Open and monitored 24 hours a day.

title: (03311) Orihuela - 34 Polígono Pinar de Bonanza
description: Pinar de Bonanza recreational area, with many tables, access to showers and toilets. Spacious, quiet and with views. Open friday-sunday.

name: Camper Park Huerta de Murcia
title: (30589) Camper Park Huerta de Murcia
description: Huerta de Murcia motorhome area, private, very clean, quiet, surrounded by lemons and oranges and 300m from the river with the bike path to Murcia. The owners are nice.

address.street: Camino Viejo de Orihuela - Carril Cánovas, 19

title: (03300) Orihuela - 49 Calle Duque de Tamames
description: Automatic washing machines

name: Área de Servicio Santomera
title: (30140) Área de Servicio Santomera
description:
Not a particularly nice place, but just a rest area. Good for one night on the way though. There is a small supermarket at the petrol station and a café with a non-stop toilet. It is recommended to stand far away from the trucks as they are quite noisy.
New fresh water and air dispenser. 5 min = 1 EUR = approx. 20 liters

title: (03300) Orihuela - 45 Calle Ronda de Santo Domingo
title_short: (03300) Orihuela - 45 Calle Ronda de Santo Domingo
description: Self-service laundry

title: (03300) Orihuela - 20 Camino Cruz de Fajardo
description: Parking at Commercial Center Carrefour. Park at the side. Walking distance to the old town with many interesting buildings, musea, churches, palm grove, street art. Orihuela is well worth visiting.

title: (03300) Orihuela - Avenida Doctor Gómez Pardo Ródenas
title_short: (03300) Orihuela - Avenida Doctor Gómez Pardo Ródenas
description: Parking tarmac very broad, is fenced, but is always open. It allows parking in a secluded and quiet place. You can sleep without problem and is ideal to leave the caravan or Camper and go to visit the city. Close to the Centre.

title: (30163) Murcia - 64 Travesía Cabezo de Torres
description: Parking for trucks and cars right at the 24-hour gas station in front there is a Burger King

name: Granja La Carmela
title: (30148) Granja La Carmela
description: Welcome to your place of relaxation, Granja La Carmela, relax and enjoy the forest and mountain environment, observe and listen to the rich variety of bird species that surround us, we have picnic tables in the shade or in the sun, a viewpoint at the sunset and views of the Santomera Reservoir, drinking water service, toilets and showers, black and gray water evacuation, electricity, mini-store with different products from the region and/or self-produced (oil, jams, preserved fruits and vegetables, orange blossom honey, wines...), we also have itineraries through the region (in forest and mountains) for hiking and mountain biking, contact us. Mosaic exhibition by the owner, possibility of mosaic courses for long stays, upon request. Large parking (7000 m2) and closed area for greater security. Possibility of hiking, we have at your disposal routes in the area (in the forest and in the mountains), beautiful cycling and rural tourism routes, restaurants very close, the center of Murcia 15 minutes away and Alicante 40 minutes away, shopping centers 5 minutes, the beach 30 minutes. We are improving services for our customers, we will inform you of the improvements. Long stay rate: contact us.

title: (03316) Los Cutillas -
description: Los Yagues Motorhome Park. Overnight stopping place for up to 5 Motorhomes only. Shower, Toilet, waste water dump.

title: (30160) Murcia - 23 Travesía Doctor Marañón 2
description: Large car park engraved flat, quiet at night, the morning the activity takes again its rights.

title: (30163) Murcia - A-4
description: Open parking in a residential area

name: Camping La Pedrera
title: (03380) Camping La Pedrera
description: Quiet site with very friendly owners, access from the CV95 CV920 round about to East of Bigastra.  Restaurant and bar adjacent to site. Area behind site is great for dog walking.

title: (30140) Santomera - RM-423
description: A good alternative for the nearby picnic area, which should not be used with larger mobiles or when it is raining. In this free parking area, 2 to 3 larger vehicles can also find an uncomplicated place to stay near the motorway.

title: (30160) Murcia - Camino Polvorín
description: Nice place to sleep peacefully. Spend the day. Eat. Take a walk. Enjoy nature. It has banks with months to eat. Play area for children. Barbecues (although they do not allow to make fire).

title: (30148) La Almazara - Unnamed Road
description: Breathtaking view of the lake, we spent a very quiet night.

title: (30163) Murcia - 3 Diseminado Camino Forestal
description: Big place with no houses around. You can hear the street, but it’s not too loud. To get here is not as simple since there is only a dirt track and no real track to drive to the place with the tables. Would only recommend for smaller vehicles (or even 4x4). Not a good place to stay if it’s raining because of the roads. Other than that, no one here only people on mountainbikes pass from time to time. (Oktober 21)

title: (03380) Bigastro - 19 Calle del Progreso
description: Repsol station with propane gas bottles

title: (03313) Bigastro -
description: Roadside location with very little traffic, police crossed the road several times never stopping. Great view and no service. There is a lot of garbage, please keep your garbage with you. Stony ground but fairly flat, very good for a stopover or an evening.

title: (03370) Redovan - 113A Calle Pascual Martínez
description: Cemetery parking and access to climbing areas and hiking trails.

title: (30163) Murcia - 7 C-3223
description: Really nice and quiet place surrounded by nature. We stopped here for one night traveling from Cadiz to Barcelona. We parked before the entrance allowed only for hiking or cycling. Hidden from the road and slightly sloping we leveled the van (a 6 meter sprinter with a stone) super quiet great

title: (03370) Redován -
description: Ground parking with a certain incline in front of Los Pasos Sports Center and Rocòdromo. Quiet place at the beginning of the Via Ferrata in Revodan. Passing place of the path PR-CV 54 to the Sierra de Callosa de Segura.

name: Área Camper Murcia Río
title: (30006) Área Camper Murcia Río
description: Come and enjoy an unforgettable vacation in the Huerta de Murcia and its Camper Area! This area is located just 5 minutes by car from the historic center of Murcia, with shops, pharmacies, restaurants, shops, cafes, supermarkets, gas stations, among others. Our area has two plots for campers: one with 14 spaces with electricity and water and a larger one with 30 spaces. We also offer toilets and free shower services. Also, to get to the city without traffic, there is a very pleasant walk along the river. Don't wait any longer and come and enjoy your vacation!

title: (30007) Murcia - 16 Calle Cieza
description: The place is quite safe even though we have never slept here. The city of Murcia seems very safe so I think you can feel very comfortable here. Near the gym there is a bus stop that takes you directly to the city centre. The bus to take is R20 which takes you directly to the centre. You can buy the ticket directly on board.

title: (30007) Murcia - 25 Calle Carril Calesas
description: Coin operated washers and dryers, open 24 hours. Self-service laundry.

title: (03360) Callosa de Segura - 144 Avenida Ciudad Jardín
title_short: (03360) Callosa de Segura - 144 Avenida Ciudad Jardín
description: Parking lot for a park/picnic area that does not have any parking restriction signs. Busy during the day with locals using park area and climbers climbing by the nearby crag. However, it is very quiet at night. The road to get to the parking lot is quite narrow so not recommended for big motor homes. Small camper vans (eg. sprinter) is ok

title: (30007) Murcia - 8 Calle de Molina de Segura
title_short: (30007) Murcia - 8 Calle de Molina de Segura
description: A parking place recommend to me by a local as a safe place near the city to park. It was empty in the afternoon, but filled up later. I parked my van here overnight with no problems (but I didnt sleep in it)

title: (30006) Murcia - 8 Camino Orilla del Río
description: La Fica fairground esplanade

title: (30011) Murcia - 4a Senda Estrecha
description: 2,6 km from the city center

title: (30007) Murcia - 1 Calle Presbítero Francisco Ibáñez Ruiz
title_short: (30007) Murcia - 1 Calle Presbítero Francisco Ibáñez Ruiz
description: Counter-alley with the possibility of parking in several places. Close to the cathedral and cycle path along this avenue.

title: (30011) Murcia - 5I Calle Ua III Pp CR4
title_short: (30011) Murcia - 5I Calle Ua III Pp CR4
description: There are several parking lots and there is no problem. It's a very quiet area with gas station and shopping center 3 minutes walk away. I parked here to attend the Warm Up Festival and it's a perfect location.

title: (30110) Churra - 511 Calle S1 Zt Churra 2
description: There is free water at the Campsa red station,  inflating tires! right next to another station where there is the laundry and also the same services

title: (30110) Murcia - 2E Calle S1 Zt Churra 2
description: Laundry, self-service, at the BP petrol station. Parking possible with a bit of luck. 4x8 kg 2x 14 kg 6 dryer wheelchair accessible. Even washing at 90° is possible.

title: (03313) Orihuela - 5 CV-950
description: Good spot for a quick rest and lunch/dinner. Has a few parking spots, and a narrow turnaround. Most suitable for smaller campers, less than 6m.

title: (30007) Murcia - 3A Avenida de Santiago
description: Parking, prohibited more than 5m, very close to the center is not monitored but has security cameras

title: (03360) Callosa de Segura - 134 Calle Nuestra Señora del Pilar
title_short: (03360) Callosa de Segura - 134 Calle Nuestra Señora del Pilar
description: Nice picnic area, flat with drinking water available a few meters away. Very nice view of the city and the surrounding valley. The access road is a bit steep but paved and of good quality.

title: (30110) Murcia -
description: Free on-road parking by a small park. Took us about 25 minutes to walk into town almost in a straight line along the de Churra road. The patisserie and bakery nearby is superb and worth stopping at alone. It’s a pretty quiet area but we only parked up for about 2 or 3 hours in the afternoon. There’s a little dog park just across the road.

title: (30110) Churra - S/N Avenida Juan de Borbón
title_short: (30110) Churra - S/N Avenida Juan de Borbón
description: Possibility of refilling gas cylinders with your connection

title: (30007) Murcia - 17 Plaza de Tetuan
description: Plaza Detetuan. Parking only. A4 minutes walk from the Center. Quiet to leave the car, visit the city and spend the night. There are several squares like this around Europe Avda.

title: (30007) Murcia - 88 Plaza de Gran Capitan
description: Open parking Perfect for night or visiting the city. recommended vehicles no larger than 6 meters. No services unguarded, free

title: (30008) Murcia - 5 Calle Nuestra Señora de los Buenos Libros
title_short: (30008) Murcia - 5 Calle Nuestra Señora de los Buenos Libros
description: Nice clean laundromat in Murcia. Parking in front of the door with a parking ticket, but parking spaces are only suitable for cars. We parked outside and came by bike. There is a nice park nearby where you can wait for the laundry.

address.street: 5 Calle Nuestra Señora de los Buenos Libros

title: (30007) Murcia - 44 Avenida Príncipe de Asturias
description: Good place to spend the night. Good cafeteria and good meat pie typical of Murcia. No problem overnight.

name: Área autocaravanas Murcia
title: (30100) Área autocaravanas Murcia
description: Parking Ikea Thader shopping center. Avenue Juan de Bourbon 30100 Murcia. Lidl, Aldy next door. Parking near the trams to go to the city center (Plaza Circular station). Stand at the place indicated on the GPS, it is where the security guard cabin is and the ground is grassy with cobblestones. Drainage and water service next door. Desde Agosto 17 con servicios, passing through on 01/10/2017. Guardian present 24 hours a day, every day. Frequent Local Policia rounds. For max.72 hours!

title: (30011) Murcia - 11E Calle Limonar
description: Huge parking with no limits an no fees, There is a small park where I could walk the dogs and children can play. Close to stores and hospital.

title: (03313) Torremendo - 4 Calle Jose Antonio-torremendo
description: very large recreational area with tables, barbecue, garbage cans etc with many trees, lots of shade. We have been able to enter with the van without problem and our dogs are delighted.

title: (03313) Torremendo -
description:
View of L'embalse, alone in the world.
The path is correct but be careful if it rains it becomes mud

title: (03350) Cox - 49 Camino Enmedio
description: Free and ample gas station parking. It has a 24-hour supermarket at normal prices. Laundry. Paid water service. Next to highway and national. Safe site. The village has a small castle.

title: (30009) Murcia - 18 Calle Cisne
description: Parking for cars and other vehicles

title: (30005) Murcia - 6 Calle de la Olma
description: Parking lot at the roadside, visited the city from here and it goes into the city from one playground to the next, perfect for a relaxed walk with the kids.

title: (30158) Murcia - Unnamed Road
description: Easy to get to, no water, no service except picnic with tables, very spacious parking, comfortable and a spectacular view, is a busy site at all times.

title: (30004) Murcia - 8 Calle Alcalde Gaspar de La Peña
title_short: (30004) Murcia - 8 Calle Alcalde Gaspar de La Peña
description: Public parking Very good to walk downtown, the aquarium or the park. There are gorillas but friendly and help to find a good place because the parking is full and can cost to leave. We have been only during the day. At night I do not trust, and it is also very loud.

address.street: 8 Calle Alcalde Gaspar de La Peña

title: (30005) Murcia - 1 Calle Los Torres
description: Payment area according to applicable hours. We park for free after 8pm and check out before 9am the next day. Wide spaces only in this sector.

title: (30004) Murcia - 8 Camino Bajo Autopista
description: Parking under the highway to visit the old town of Murcia. 10 minute walk. We have only been during the day, a lot of noise at night. We in van but possibility of campers and motorhomes. The squares are not delimited

title: (30010) Murcia - 9 Carril Ortuños
description: Big parking lot where guys for a small tip will allocate you a spot. great for a visit to the city. lots of space, 7m walk from the old center.

title: (03313) Torremendo - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place next to the water. Super quiet and the sunsets are amazing. The water is super nice. A bit trash everywhere. I would recommend a 4x4 because we was here after a week of heavy rain, so the path was very muddy and one bigger step down(for a non 4x4).

title: (03313) Orihuela - Unnamed Road
description: Couple of spots overlooking the water. Mostly flat. There are more options in the area. Some dirt bikes in the area on Sunday morning, otherwise quiet. No shade, no services.

title: (30012) Murcia - 26 Diseminado Taller
description: There are several parking spaces around a football stadium, next to residence, place in the middle with children's playground 5-10 minutes by car from the city center

title: (03390) Benejúzar - 2 Arrabal Zval10 Dotacional
description: Sanctuary of Our Lady of Pilar de Benejúzar. It is a parking area next to the sanctuary, the toilets a few meters. There are also a lot more spacious parking spaces about 200 meters from the Sanctuary.

title: (03390) Benejúzar - 47 Diseminados
description: Location ideally located in a quiet area. it is a municipal car park where you can spend the night. hiking trails or bike rides. nearby (10min bike) a few small shops. accessible for any type of vehicle. we are accessible there with our heavy weight of 19T for 12m long and 3.80m high

title: (30009) Murcia - 1B Carril Clérigos
description: Parking to a park ... in the shade under the trees ... without services ... 4km from the cathedral

title: (30009) Murcia - Carril Pollos 49
description:
Area Camper Murcia Center

whatsapp available

We are located at the Espinardo-La Albatalia exit

Our Area has a 24H Security guard, 24H access

5000 meters available to our clients to park their motorhomes and enjoy the center of the city of Murcia.

30 places available

bike 5 minutes
By feet 10 minutes
car 2 minutes

We Speak English, Wir sprechen Deutsch,Parliamo Italiano, мы говорим по-русски.

title: (30157) Murcia - 3 Diseminado Subida Cresta Gallo
description:
Beautiful quiet spot with amazing view on Murcia by ba and night, for just 1/2 cars to park
Ground is not flat, therefore to visit by foot or offroad vehicle, but i did with a peugeot partner, except of that, excellent spot, best of all others on this mountain.

title: (30100) Murcia - 26 Diseminado Carretera Madrid
description: Small service station (fuel price cheaper than in main known companies), with access to drinking water for filling tanks). They have a built-in high flow hose. Free wheel pressure maintenance area. Access has power outlets (you have to ask for permission). At night it is closed.

title: (03193) Torremendo - 5 Lugar 15
description: Slightly sloping car park, ideal for spending a night, very quiet, beautiful view of the lake which is 300m away, large spaces for dogs

title: (30100) Murcia - 7 Calle Campus Universitario
description: Online parking on campus, I park here for an exam, very quiet all night and passers-by from campus pass by from time to time.

title: (03313) Torremendo -
description: Access by gravel road. Small very steep descent then the last 100 meters on the slopes. Access to the Spot a little tight, beware of large size. Spot isolated from the wind and the sun from view. 4G internet ok.

title: (03313) Torremendo -
description: Quiet Cookie!! Close to the lake (not for swimming). Good for a van. When it rains it can get muddy quickly! Spent 2 quiet nights there :) nice bike ride around the lake possible... Very relaxed!

title: (30506) Molina de Segura - 100 Avenida del Golf
title_short: (30506) Molina de Segura - 100 Avenida del Golf
description: Parking of a small super quiet shopping center, free and open 24 hours with a supermarket and gas station. It is perfect because it is located in a luxury urbanization with private security.

title: (30506) Molina de Segura - 16 Avenida de los Castaños
title_short: (30506) Molina de Segura - 16 Avenida de los Castaños
description: Public parking for the night. There is a gas station and areas to buy food nearby. Quiet place and close to the highway.

title: (03310) Vistabella - C. Mandarino
description: Huge car park near the Vistabella golf course. No one in January. super calm

title: (30157) Murcia - Calle Nuestra Señora de la Fuensanta
title_short: (30157) Murcia - Calle Nuestra Señora de la Fuensanta
description: Large car park by a church with no signs indicating restrictions. Fabulous little bar nearby for excellent and cheap food.

address.street: Calle Nuestra Señora de la Fuensanta

title: (30107) Murcia - 36 Avenida Juan Carlos ।
description: Quiet residential area next to the highway, close to supermarkets and bars (walking)

title: (30151) Murcia - 83 Calle de la Luz
description:
I moved to this place as the other ones are either closed at 21h or occupied by chillin' youths.
This is close to a monastery where people seem to live. It's a bit lit during night and lies lower than the passing road. The nights are quiet. 3 cars passing before 11pm. It's great for hikes and views on Murcia.

title: (03169) Algorfa - 1 Polígono Sector I-Equipamiento
description: Hermitage on the outskirts of Algorfa, easy access, flat land, spacious and quiet, beautiful views, 5 minute walk to the small town with many shops, bars and restaurants. Golf course 10 minutes by car. Picnic tables under the shade of the trees next to the Hermitage. We parked with no problem for 3 nights, apart from the occasional dog walker we didn't see anyone. however, they use the area during the party.

title: (30150) Murcia - 1 Calle San Antonio Pobre
description: Parking along a small road where only walkers and a few cars pass very nice view in the middle of nature we spent the quiet night there

title: (30150) Murcia - 58 Carretera del Valle
description: Very good place to spend the night, with a BBQ area and bins. Good access on asphalt road and parking on land. Preferable to enter from the right. Hikers for the day. An excellent restaurant bar a few minutes walk away.

title: (30150) Murcia - Carretera El Valle
description: Picnic area known as the Valley. Quiet area, nearby bar with somewhat expensive prices but good quality. Close to the botanical garden. Many MTB routes, hiking and trail running. MOTORHOMES OVER 5.50 METERS AVOID THE URBAN CENTER OF LA ALBERCA, it is advisable to enter and exit through Algezares through the Fuensanta Sanctuary.

title: (30626) Los Baños de Fortuna -
description:
Nice place in the desert of Abanilla. You can go along the path, there are several places where you can park.
It's better to push a bit further because at the beginning of the path, there are a couple of trashes (nothing that really spoils the place nor the scenery, but I prefer to warn ;)).
Beautiful, secluded place, but no shade and no service.

title: (30830) La Ñora - 9 Avenida Poeta Vicente Medina
title_short: (30830) La Ñora - 9 Avenida Poeta Vicente Medina
description: Paved parking with children's playground, in the center of town, 2 minutes from the bus stop and 10 from the tram ideal for overnight stay and visit Murcia

title: (30150) - 29 Diseminado Carretera Valle
description: Great spot for the night with many walks and fantastic views over Murcia, 4/5 spaces for larger vans or motorhomes and loads for small vans.

title: (30649) Los Baños de Fortuna -
description: A desert-like place with very nice views and a walking route nearby, a few kilometers from a local village

title: (30120) Murcia - La Pisada del Diablo
description: Quiet place, many routes for mountain biking, hiking and trail. He has no water. Nearby bar for tapas very recommendable with a terrace to enjoy the freshness of summer.

title: (30620) Fortuna - 28 Avenida Vicente Medina
description: Parking near Center for Child day care. Walking distance to center of Fortuna. Close to supermarket. Nice hiking possibilities in rural area.

title: (03349) S. Isidro - 1 Calle Belgica
description: Repsol petrol station with a small supermarket and laundromat with washing machines and dryers. Very good way to wash the mobile home. The pressure washer is great. There is a staircase so that you can also clean the roof. Next door there is a car wash in 2 different heights. Staff very nice and helpful.

title: (30649) La Huerta -
description: Esplanade of land next to the track, in the middle of the Abanilla desert. It is accessed by the road from Baños de Fortuna to Mahoya, and the last kilometer is a dirt track in good condition, signposted as "Ruta la huerta-los barrancos". Close to the Leana Spa and the Chicano River Trail. The landscape is spectacular but there is no shade. **take the access road over the hill as the other access road has deep gulleys and you might get stuck**

title: (30500) Molina de Segura - Av. Rio Segura
title_short: (30500) Molina de Segura - Av. Rio Segura
description:
Nice and quiet parking space bordering the town of Molina de Segura with the orchard. Asphalted, fenced, lighted, flat. Connection with the greenway just in front that will take you to the Segura River or the greenway on the way north-west (towards Caravaca).

Motorhome area inaugurated in March 2023 with picnic tables and chairs and 100m from the center of Molina de Segura.

Mudem museum and old town 200 m away, shopping center and small shops and numerous restaurants across the street.

Quiet place with many possibilities.

title: (30509) Molina de Segura - 380 Autovía de Murcia
title_short: (30509) Molina de Segura - 380 Autovía de Murcia
description: Gas station 24, clean bathrooms and shower. Allows overnight

title: (03160) Almoradí - 1 Avenida Príncipe España
description: Laundry, LA COLADA, good access near the motorhome area.

title: (30649) Los Baños de Fortuna -
description: A beautiful place in the "desert". Directly at the Mirador Los Barrancos. Lots of options for standing and staying overnight. The path is not quite as good at the beginning, but it works. wonderful all-round view.

title: (30500) Molina de Segura - Ctra de Madrid
title_short: (30500) Molina de Segura - Ctra de Madrid
description: Service area with supermarket, cafeteria, washers, dryers, washing machine for pets, good access from the highway, motorhome wash. parking.

title: () Almoradí - 56 Calle Granados
description: Pitch, next to the sports center, well signposted, spacious, flat. Sporting events until 9 p.m. and quiet from 10 p.m. Cars can hardly be heard, despite the nearby roundabout. Ideal to visit the city or to spend a quiet night. Laundromat at the roundabout. Gulli for emptying gray water is at the back of the square, towards the stairs. Water tap with good pressure at the entrance of the parking lot.

name: Camping Los Banos de la Fuente
title: (30649) Camping Los Banos de la Fuente
title_short: (30649) Camping Los Banos de la Fuente
description: Campsite open all year. Swimming pool water at 36°C with hydromassage and massage showers. Supply and disposal in an area that is also suitable for large WoMo. Sanitary facilities with shared showers as well as individual showers. Catering available. The swimming pool must be paid extra.

title: (30831) Murcia - Margen Rio Segura
description: A gravel road leads directly to the small foot. You can have a good night's sleep in the countryside. 3 minutes from the A7, but you only hear water and birds.

title: (03349) San Isidro - 3 Calle Salvador
description: Barbecues area with very quiet parking in San Isidro Alicante

title: (30120) Murcia - 6 Calle Doctor Francisco Espinosa Espinosa
title_short: (30120) Murcia - 6 Calle Doctor Francisco Espinosa Espinosa
description: Free parking next to houses. It is perfect to spend a quiet day.

title: (03349) San Isidro - 9 Calle Huertos Familiares
description: A very quiet street in front of San Isidro sports center (Alicante)

title: (30832) Murcia - 2 Diseminado Contraparada
description: We spent a quiet night between the railway (a single train at 9pm) and a lemon plantation. . Perfect for cutting the trip, without moving away from the highway

title: (30832) Murcia - 2 N-344
description: Flat parking near the exit of the highway, without the inconvenience

title: (30648) Ricabacica -
description: Magnificent place in the middle of the extremely quiet desert where we spent the night and in the morning a short walk on the summit where you have a crazy panorama. It is next to an abandoned house with access on a paved road

title: (30649) - 51 Diseminado los Baños
description: Parking for mobile homes and caravans with filling and emptying service for gray and black water. Wireless. To shower. Light. 1 km from the spa town of Leana (Fortuna). Possibility of seeing meals with the owners of the restaurant. ? Can only be booked on a monthly basis for 150 euros per month

title: (30648) El Salado -
description: Quiet parking, at the foot of the track with easy access and close to the road. No services. Near the beginning of the hiking route of Las Pozas del Río Chicamo.

name: Country Camping in Murcia
title: (30156) Country Camping in Murcia
description: Country Camping near Murcia, a nice, clean site/campsite for 6 motorhomes on a gravelled, walled area. 2 nice, clean and large toilet/shower rooms. Very friendly operator couple. Recommended. Nice one hour bike ride to Murcia possible. Visit our site for more information

title: (30564) Lorquí - Avenida Iryda
description: Small parking lot on the corner of a tree area. We stopped at rest and lunch. There is a bell pepper in the corner with a small shop.

title: (03193) San Miguel de Salinas - 68 Avenida de Levante
title_short: (03193) San Miguel de Salinas - 68 Avenida de Levante
description: Free parking with views

title: (30591) - 16 Calle Murcia
description: Parking along the road. Very well

title: (03349) San Isidro - Partida veintiuno nr 14
description:
Small-scale and cozy camper place along the A7. Beautiful garden with swimming pool. Dogs can play to their heart's content in our enclosed garden of 10,000 m2. Chemical toilet can only be used if an organic product is used. (We do not use any chemicals)
Also no dogs and sunscreen in the pool.
Car available.

Spoken languages:
Dutch English German French Spanish.

Hasta luego!

title: (03158) Catral - 2I Calle Extremadura
description: Lots of parking available right next to supermarket and cafe and restaurants. We had lovely Indian a few meters away. Our Motorhome is 8 meters and we parked for free no problem

title: (30837) Alcantarilla - 11 Calle Maestra Josefina Lozano Pinar
title_short: (30837) Alcantarilla - 11 Calle Maestra Josefina Lozano Pinar
description: Alcantarilla Athletics Tracks and Soccer Field. You can access to use the TOILETS and SHOWERS without problem, whether you are a resident of the town or not. Possibility of parking at the door. (Slight incline) a few meters below, in front of the San José Hospital, approximately 30 flat parking spaces.

title: (30629) Fortuna - 5 Camino Cueva
description:
Santuario Romano de la Cueva Negra

Nice picnic area for 10 motorhomes, grill places and stone tables. Beautiful caves above, tap water.

title: (03340) Alicante -
description: Stop for the Rambla Salada hike. Several level outskirts. Very quiet night, no traffic.

name: Casa Castor Catral
title: (03349) Casa Castor Catral
description: Small-scale camper place for 2 to 3 campers, located in a quiet place. Large enclosed garden with several seating areas and a self-service pool bar. Opportunity to wash. Pets allowed.

address.street: Azarbe de los Partidores/Partida El Realengo

title: (03150) Dolores - 19 Diseminado Mayayo
description: High-pressure washing for trucks + vacuum cleaner.

title: (03150) - 182A Diseminado Cebadas
description: Very cozy camper place with bars and swimming pool for 8 campers, operated by Wim and Marijke. All facilities available if you stay overnight. Reservations are recommended, then you are sure of your place.

title: (30320) Fuente Álamo de Murcia -
description: Quiet and level parking

name: Marjal Costa Blanca Camping & Resort
title: (03158) Marjal Costa Blanca Camping & Resort
description: Marjal Costa Blanca Camping & Resort, It's great camping, new, clean, secure. Indoor and heated pool. Animations all the year. There is everything on site. Even the sound of the highway next door. Given the number in this month of February, some like ...

title: (30564) Lorquí - 14 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Open and flat space of dirt and gravel for several vehicles next to the Virgen del Rosario hermitage. On top of a hill, on the outskirts of the industrial estate, very quiet and without shade. Nobody passes by here. You can hear the road in the background as white noise, but also the birds around you. To spend a calm night with views of the surroundings. Access by hill, but without major problem.

title: (03176) Rojales - 74 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Very large parking lot. no amenities. pleasant Sunday market.

title: (03339) Crevillent - 535 CV-904
description: Possibility of refueling fresh water and discharge of gray. The service also offers the discharge of black water, the place of discharge visible in photos 3 and 5. It is enough to lift a small grate.

title: (03191) Pinar de Campoverde - 29 Calle Tejo P C
title_short: (03191) Pinar de Campoverde - 29 Calle Tejo P C
description: Parking near sport facilities and restaurant at the edge of the town of Pinar de Campo Verde. Garbage and recycling bins are on the parking. Nice walks along the river with small canyons. Quiet.

title: (30565) Las Torres de Cotillas - 45 Avenida Reyes Católicos
title_short: (30565) Las Torres de Cotillas - 45 Avenida Reyes Católicos
description: New Service Area since February 2021 in the sports area of the population. It has water service and parking. Pools, football, games, tennis, paddle tennis, pavilion ...

title: (03689) Hondón de los Frailes -
description: A lovely abandoned quarry with great views.

title: (30564) Lorquí - Esquina Avenida Papa Ali
description: There are washing machines and a great washing area for motorhomes of all sizes. There is a walk-in jetty at the washing area to wash the roof. The facility is great and for little money. You can pay with euro coins. You can get coins for the laundromat at the petrol station.

title: (03158) Catral - 12A Camino de lo Chicharra
description: Agricultural farm with production of vegetables and fruits that can be purchased very fresh from the field. Hof has a small parking lot where you can park mobile homes or campers. Small flock of sheep, goats, chicken coop, geese. In addition to a barbecue area and tables, there are also toilets and showers, as well as sinks with hot water. Fresh water supply possible. The host speaks Spanish and English.

title: (03178) Benijófar - 1 Lugar Diseminados
description: Great place for a night on the outskirts of Benijar. Quiet area, you are on a street with hardly any traffic, and you can walk to the nice center of Benijar. Recycle bins only, no other services.

title: (03150) Dolores - 40 Sector 3
description: Very quiet for the night, in the garden museum, visit the city of Dolores, very beautiful place of the church.

name: AREA 15 Formentera
title: (03179) AREA 15 Formentera
description: Motorhome area in the urban center. It has 15 plots of 8 meters long and 4.30 meters wide, with electricity service and tap, gray and black water emptying area, Wi-Fi, barbecue... the area is fenced and the site is guarded. by security camera system. At 50 meters there is a supermarket and bars. Emptying and filling water service en route: €5 (free overnight) There is a municipal swimming pool 500m away during the summer season.

title: (30564) Lorquí - Calle Clara Campoamor
description: Community area Lorqui. Downtown shops are about 500 m in the park itself there are public toilets. Note: Monday morning 7: 00 to 15: 00 market weekly to place in this area, is the extent and the surface water exchange cancelled.

title: (03187) Los Montesinos - 105 Camino Viejo de Orihuela
title_short: (03187) Los Montesinos - 105 Camino Viejo de Orihuela
description: Space in the ground at the foot of an observation tower not far from the Rose Lake, very calm and far from the dwellings. Access a little narrow, no problem in the van, except perhaps in rainy weather. Good walk...!

name: La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
title: (03150) La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
title_short: (03150) La Fabrica Dolores Art Living Events
description:
Welcome to Jonathan & Michael – the now legendary campground exclusively for adults aged 14 and above, starting from October 2023. We've gained cult status and international recognition for our innovations and warm hospitality. Fluent in 8 languages, we offer countless cultural and recreational activities, regular events, and valuable tips for your stay. Just minutes away from breathtaking beaches, dunes, and pine forests, with shopping and dining options within walking distance. Easy to find on Google Maps with Park4Night. Want to extend your stay? We'd love to have you!

Dogs:
Attention: No Off-Leash Dogs Allowed & Only Quiet Dogs Allowed
-----
Prices:
Vehicle and trailer length less than 8 meters
1 night: €14
1 month: €350
Plus €2 for total length over 8 meters (night)
------
Service inclusive:
- 2 adults and 1 pet
- Gray and black water
- Fill up with water
- WIFI Fiber optic internet (high speed)
- WC & showers (hot water)
- Fitness / Gym
------
Service exklusiv:
- Electricity 3 € (6 Ampere) or 0.50/kwh
- Washing 5 €
- Additional adults €4
- Additional animals €1
----
Car rental:
1 Day / 25 €
----
Professional help and translation service
(Repairs, notary, doctor, lawyers, real estate, etc. fluent in the following languages:
Spanish / German / English / Dutch / French /
€ 15 per hour

Guided tours, climbing, hikes etc. with Jonathan.
Price depends on the number of people

title: (03340) Albatera - 235 Partida Lomas Gp. 2
description:
Beautifully landscaped pitch in our garden, for max 2 campers up to 7.5 m,

with access to water electricity. toilet, washing machine and dryer, swimming pool, petanque court,
5 km from Mercadona and other shops and restaurants
 30 km from the sea or Alicante and Torrevieja (Santa Pola, La Marina) possibility to rent a car or scooter.

Mandatory notification by e-mail.

longer period negotiable on site.

title: (03178) Benijófar - Escalera Huertos
description: Picnic area, BBQ area. There are many tables. We stayed for lunch during the day. The road can be heard, immediately after that we drove on. The parking lot is big enough to turn around.

name: Camping "Florantilles"
title: (03186) Camping "Florantilles"
description: "Florantilles" campsite with all services, supermarket, bar ...

title: (03315) Fondó dels Frares - Unnamed Road
description: Super quiet place with magnificent view and the possibility of ballads on foot, mountain bike or motocross.

title: (03178) Benijófar - 2A Calle Aneto
description: Parking behind/next to the MacDonalds. Restaurants, bars and shops within walking distance. Nicely landscaped park for walking and playground for children. Suitable for larger motorhomes or combinations

title: (03158) Catral - 74B Camino lo Chicharra
description: Quiet, small-scale camping spot near the El Fondo nature reserve. 2.5 km from the village of Catral. Swimming pool available. Bikes for rent in the village. Cozy restaurants, open all year round. 6 seats.

title: (30562) Ceutí - Calle Río Quípar
description: Ceutí Municipal Space.- The area is in urban areas near the industrial area. Downtown '300 m. Supermarket 100 m. This area has adapted toilets (ask for the key at City Hall) Hotel facilities are in town.

title: (03170) Ciudad Quesada - 3A Calle los Arcos
description: Miele Self-Service Laundry. Open 365 days.

title: (03158) Crevillent - 1A Partida San Felipe Neri
description:
Large car park without amenities, next to a natural park. Large campsite nearby.

Overnight stays are no longer allowed since March 7, 2023, the park authorities have introduced new rules here.

name: Sheppards Rest
title: (03150) Sheppards Rest
description:
Sheppherd Rest. British run and frendley small camp site about 3km from Dolores 
Please phone to book.
phone

title: (03170) Ciudad Quesada - 6 Calle Badajoz Número 1
description: Avenue de Cádiz unbuilt urbanization area Lighting calm tranquil view of the lake in the distance consum aldi at 5oo meters Drinking water at 200 meters at the fountain in the dog park going up the avenue

description: Place in a quiet and uncrowded area.

description:
Nice corner with a beautiful view, without service.
climbing via ferrata near.

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - CV-941
description: Place to eat next to the lake. We do not know if the overnight stay is allowed. Small AC and campers.

title: (03186) Torrevieja - Calle Ercina
description: Large parking at the edge of the saltworks. No service but very quiet. Access by dirt road a little hunchback, I think to avoid in rainy weather

title: (03339) Marxant -
description: Land parking in the heart of the Sierra de Crevillent without any service but with stunning views at sunrise and tranquility at night. Access by dirt track in perfect condition and suitable for all types of vehicle. Ideal place to visit the San Cayetano Mountain Park and start one of the most classic hiking trails in the area.

title: (03184) El Chaparral - 2 Calle Múnera
description: Great, very quiet place by the lake. Font passed several times without comment. Although remote, some English residents allow themselves to be taken for Police. Again the Police confirms that we can park without problem. Nearby bike path to reach Torrevieja and shops nearby.

title: (03170) Rojales - 116 Urbanizacion Ciudad Quesada II
description: Quiet parking lot with lots of shade.

title: (03190) Pilar de la Horadada - 2 Calle Clara Campoamor
title_short: (03190) Pilar de la Horadada - 2 Calle Clara Campoamor
description: Gas station with laundry

title: (03184) Torrevieja - 190 Calle Venus
description: Quiet place to spend the night in the center between the inhabited area and a bar

title: (03186) Torrevieja - 3 Calle Salvador Dalí
description: Free water refill at side of car wash behind Repsol gas station

title: (03186) Torrevieja - 27 Calle Levante Bal
description: It is next to the hospital and has a 24/7 Repsol gas station next door (entrance to the car park through the roundabout where these two are located) the gas station has a 24/7 shop and has a bathroom to go to, it has a good connection to the urban buses being able to take the DF and E lines at the hospital and has views of both the sea and the lagoon

title: (03170) Rojales - 306 Urbanización Ciudad Quesada 2
description: Beautiful extensive hiking and mountain biking area. Quiet place, no grooming.

title: (03689) Fondó dels Frares - 12 CV-845
description: Gravel parking, slight slope, calm road in this month of May. no service. Very good for one night.

title: (03189) Orihuela - Carretera de Villamartín
description: This is a parking place for a shopping centre. Motor homes stay here regularly.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 32 Paseo Marítimo Cmor
description: A quiet and shady place is level the beach is about 10 minutes walk

name: Càmping Les Palmeres
title: (03330) Càmping Les Palmeres
description: Camping Las Palmeras within a restaurant/hotel complex - quiet in this season, shaded - swimming pool - perfect for visiting Elche.

title: (03189) Dehesa de Campoamor - 1 Calle Gloria Fuertes
title_short: (03189) Dehesa de Campoamor - 1 Calle Gloria Fuertes
description: Very large and quiet forest area with picnic tables, 5 minutes walk from the beach and surrounded by a residential area. We have not seen any water sources or bathrooms, (we are not looking for much, the walk is long) it's good to do it only one night (there is no sign that prohibited)

title: (03184) Torrevieja - Calle de las Lavanderas
description: Near the pink lake, free parking near a park. Very quiet, lots of space. Warning: don't leave your car unattended here, they infiltrated ours and stole everything in the middle of the day! police said it was okay here, small vehicles only.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 186 Ronda Federico García Lorca
description: We spent 2 nights in this quiet parking lot. the sea is about 500m away

title: (30600) Archena - 61 Avenida del Río Segura
description: A large parking area next to a sports hall and next to the river. The city is famous for its spa that offers excellent beauty and relaxation treatments with excellent heated swimming pools. There is a beautiful bike path along the river into town. There is some noise and flood lights from the sports stadium, but not too much to be annoying.

title: (30612) Ulea - N-301
description: Large parking in the picnic area. Ideal for spending the night or eating on the road. A little noise with the neighboring highway

title: (30629) La Garapacha - 29 Aldea Garapacha
description: Parking at the foot of the access path to Via Ferrata la Garapacha

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 1J Calle Albariño
description: Wooded and secluded park to spend the day and / or spend the night. No service but right next to a shopping center with everything you need to stock up. 10 minutes from some coves and many places of tourist visit.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 11 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: Simple open space at the side of the road, not very clean but a little shady, very close to the beach. nothing special

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 5C Calle Albariño
description: Self-service laundry, located in a shopping center, with a large parking lot and easy access. next to a CONSUM supermarket, a Pharmacy and several restaurants.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 35 Calle Rube Darío Cmor
description: Large parking area 100m from the beach. Very quiet with some shady spots. Cycling. Walking. Esplanade. Close to shops and restaurants.

title: (03339) Crevillente - 11 CV-875
description: Drinking water and air service at the Repsol gas station

title: (03189) Orihuela - 107 Calle Ortosa
description: Earthen car park under construction there are 2 bowling green at the back Lighting, pizzeria 50 meters away Accessible to any size camper van quiet for one night

title: (03189) Orihuela - 10 Calle Santa Alodia
description:
Parking for motorhome by Lidl, a bit loud from the motorway, but a good place to spend the day/night.
short walk to euromarket, restaurants and bars.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 1H Polígono A-1 Aguamarina
description: Nice place for washing.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 1 Calle Paz Zen
description: Quiet parking near shopping centers and the beach.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - 7B Calle Jose Lorca Garcia
description: Petrol and diesel service available brand new with very cheap price (diesel 1.22). Washing station next to it not open yet.

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 9 N-332
description: Torrevieja cemetery parking lot, lots of parking spaces, very quiet, close to the N332, shady, no service

title: (03189) Orihuela - 1 Calle J Monroy Cmor
description: Parking at the edge of the grass and 100m from the beach

title: (03189) Orihuela - 12B Polígono A-1 Aguamarina
description: Mixed parking for the day only at the top of the cliffs. Superb view. Attention it is market place on Thursday

title: (03330) Crevillent - 93 Carrer Barranc
description: We have spent the night here. Little crowded place. very well

name: Aparcamiento Torrevieja
title: (03185) Aparcamiento Torrevieja
description: Parking lot with camper service. 50 meters from the sea. With toilets, showers, laundry, dryer. Pool next to the parking lot (managed by another company), vending machines (water, soft drinks, etc.). Gray and black water disposal. Fill up with water and connect to electricity. Very close to Torrevieja Hospital. Supermarkets and restaurants nearby. Municipal bus stop, at one of the pedestrian entrances to the car park. Beach 50 meters away. Dog beach 500 meters. Tents are not allowed (chairs and tables or similar may not be set up). Business hours from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. Pre-reservations are currently being accepted and processed in the order in which they are requested. Places of interest: - La Zenia Boulevard Shopping Center 9 minutes, 6 km - Corvera-Murcia International Airport 44 minutes on the AP-7 - 45 minutes on the N-332, without tolls. - El Altet-Alicante Airport 45 minutes on the AP-7 - 45 minutes on the N-332, without tolls. Golf courses: - Real Club de Golf Campoamor (Orihuela-Costa) at 12.6 km, 17 minutes - Las Colinas Golf & Country Club (Orihuela-Costa) at 12.9 km, 18 minutes - AP-7 Motorway, at 8 minutes, 4.8 km. Marinas: - International Marina (Torrevieja) at 3.7 km, 8 minutes - Marina Salinas (Torrevieja) at 4.7 km, 11 minutes. Nearby places of interest: Orihuela 25 kms. Elche, Alicante, Murcia, La Manga del Mar Menor.

title: (03688) El Fondó de les Neus - Unnamed Road
title_short: (03688) El Fondó de les Neus - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area to spend the day with the family

title: (03189) Orihuela - Carrer los Claveles
description: Beautiful palm boulevard directly along the sandy beach. Fantastic view over small, palm-lined bay and the sea. Dog beach nearby. Pleasantly busy during the day, at night we were alone.

title: (03190) Pilar de la Horadada - 15 Calle Igualdad
title_short: (03190) Pilar de la Horadada - 15 Calle Igualdad
description: Shaded parking until 12 no noise at night.

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 5 Calle Mar del Norte
description: Street perpendicular to the promenade is quieter. We slept perfectly all night. Too many people pass by on the walk and it becomes difficult to rest. It is the Cantabrian Sea Street. Parallel to is the one we spent the night with.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 19 Calle los Nardos
description: Busy during the day, but ideal at night

title: (03189) Orihuela - 37R Polígono A-1 Aguamarina
description: Nice little spot to park up for the day and night. lovely view of the sunrise also great spot for snorkeling. parking is free as well.

title: (03149) Guardamar del Segura - 42 Plaça SUP-8
description: Urbanizacion not built quiet calm ideal for resting accessible to any size of camper van 1 km 5 from the Sunday lemon market in Guadarmar

title: (30592) Torre-Pacheco - Unnamed Road
description: Not pretty but if you are in a pinch it will work. Almost level, bit of trash from the orchards thrown around. Next to this there is also a dead end street you could park on, it also has trash but it is level. No shade, no services

title: () Torrevieja - 8B Avinguda Mare Nostrum
description: This is street parking. There is a supermarket and bars close by.

title: (03189) Orihuela - 14 Urbanisason Mil P Vistamar
description: No amenities

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 12 Paseo de los Conquistadores
description: This is street parking. Motorhomes have been made welcome in the past There are three bars close by. In high summer it will be busy.

title: (03184) Torrevieja - av de la Estacion
description: Parking where you can spend the night without problems, a little noise due to the road

title: (03189) Orihuela - 136 Calle Violetas
description: Parking on the first line of Cala Estaca on the elevated with beautiful views and walking path. Quiet place but not to take out tables

title: (03185) Torrevieja - 37 Avenida Desiderio Rodríguez
description:
A parking area with a sea view that can accommodate medium-sized motorhomes and mobile homes. 
 A very beautiful place.
 There are also restaurants where you can go to the toilet and take food and drink

title: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 5P Urbanización Mil P Parcelas
title_short: (03191) Pilar de la Horadada - 5P Urbanización Mil P Parcelas
description: A large parking near the tenis courts. Very quiet. The only sounds are the tenis balls. 300 M to the beach with water and toilets. Around few restaurants and bars with music but still quiet. Few bóg trees to hide.

name: CAMPING LO MONTE
title: (03191) CAMPING LO MONTE
description: Camping Lo-monte super nice despite the influx of people mostly German near downtown bike 5 min bike path direct out swimming pool interior home super multilingualism very nice ...

title: (03189) Orihuela - Paseo Marítimo
description: A beach bar at the end of March to December. Parking only for the small caravan around 7 Mr. Restaurants easy within walking distance "El Capitan".

title: (03191) Pueblo Latino - 114 Calle Sierra Escalona
description: Parking outside La Monte Campsite. Good for big Motorhomes. Easy walk on to the campsite to use toilets/Bar/restaurant.
